tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went for my wife's dental treatment first time and it was nice they treated their patients explained very well about the problems if I compare their charges it was way better then other doctors charged very pocket friendly. I would recommend everyone to go at least once for their treatment rather than going somewhere.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great experience. Friendly behaviour of the staff members. Polite and experienced doctors, extremely qualified in any kind of dental treatment without any pain. **** ****** ** ****** ***** *** ****** ***** I would prefer to all, instead of taking risk with others.

I visited to Dr Nisha for replacing my missing tooth. She suggested me implant treatment for my missing teeth. It was nice and latest option for missing teeth as I search on net also. It was great experience to done my treatment here. Dr Nisha now become a favourite dentist for me for lifetime.

I came to this clinic for correction of my smile. Entire team of Dentavista clinic is so good. Doctor Nisha in this clinic gave personal attention to me and correct my smile in association with other doctors here. The behaviour and nature of doctors here is great.

Excellent clinic in east delhi....very much satisfied with the overall experience here..
Dr Nisha explained the procedure of placing the implant so nicely that all my worries gone. Overall very nice experience.... I will highly recommend this clinic to all my friends
The experience was very good. I like the clinic very much. The doctor always takes good care of me and he also made me understand all the procedures. My fear of dentists has completely vanished!!!

context: Dental Implant Fixing,Fixed Partial Denture (FPD),Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: I had severe pain in my teeth , when I visited to this clinic. Dr Nisha attended me very well and help to cure my problem. It is really a good clinic near to my house.

Service is too good, 
I had too much problems in my teeths, but when i came here and got trement with these spealised and expericenced doctors my teeths are tottaly fine. I will recommend this clinic to everyone.
I visited this clinic for the cleaning of my teeth and smell coming out of my mouth. Dr Nisha treated me very nicely . thanks doctor.
It is very nice clinic. Dr Nisha treated me so nicely. I came here for cleaning of my teeth and gum problem. Now I am absolutely fine. Thanks doctor.
